definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Our granddaddies swung on them nooses . Our grandmamas swung on them nooses .
sentences.chinese: 我們的爺爺奶奶們懸掛在繩套上。

sentences.english: While the otter is going about this task, the rabbit fashions a noose from tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 趁着水獺抓鴨子的工夫，兔子用樹皮做了一個繩套。

sentences.english: Use safety and reliable rope socket.
sentences.chinese: 要使用安全可靠的繩套。

sentences.english: To inflate put the red  toggle sharply downwards.
sentences.chinese: 充氣時迅速向下拉紅色的繩套。

sentences.english: This rope socket is not reliable.
He pulled ahead of me and dove for the rope.
sentences.chinese: 他跑到了我的前面，飛向那個繩套。

sentences.english: Peter threw a rope around the wolf.
sentences.chinese: 這時彼得拋出繩套套住了狼。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, instead of putting the bungee cord around her ankle, they put it around her neck
sentences.chinese: 你媽是個醜八怪，蹦極繩套她的脖子不套腳。
